pli-tv-pvr1.3:5.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:5.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.3:6.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:6.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati—
